atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Tailwind v4 directive to define theme configuration inline in CSS.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: Tailwind v4 directive to define custom variant selectors.

atDirectives.name: @import
atDirectives.description: Import Tailwind CSS and other stylesheets.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Specify which config file Tailwind should use when compiling a CSS file.

atDirectives.name: @plugin
atDirectives.description: Register Tailwind plugins directly in your CSS.
